Reset the color strip to factory default

paramInformation.label: Color Change Speed Level
paramInformation.description: Applies only when the Color Transition Style is set to Fade Out/In

paramInformation.label: Time Base of Color Change Speed
paramInformation.description: Applies only when the Color Transition Style is set to Fade Out/In

paramInformation.label: Cycle Count
paramInformation.description: Defines the number of repetitions of the color transition cycle

paramInformation.label: Brightness
paramInformation.description: Brightness when in color transition mode

paramInformation.label: Color Display Cycle
paramInformation.description: Defines the mode for determining colors used in color transitions

paramInformation.label: Color Change Speed Option
paramInformation.description: Applies only when the Color Transition Style is set to Fade Out/In

options.label: Fade in for 1/2 second and fade out for 1/2 second
Fade in for 5ms and fade out for 5ms
Fade in for 50ms and fade out for 50ms

paramInformation.label: Color Transition Style
paramInformation.description: Defines how the strip transitions between colors

paramInformation.description: Get the strip’s color value. note: this parameter is a get-only parameter

paramInformation.description: Color index configuration when the LED strip is in multi color mode

metadata.inclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, press the Action Button on the Color Strip Controller
metadata.exclusion: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into exclusion mode, press the Action Button on the Color Strip Controller
metadata.reset:
Press and hold the Action Button on the Color Strip Controller for 20 seconds and then release it.
Use this procedure only in the event that your primary network controller is missing or inoperable
